descriptionHtml:
TacitRed SentinelOne IOC Automation provides a Logic App playbook that automatically syncs compromised credential indicators from TacitRed to SentinelOne.

This solution includes:

  • Playbook: TacitRedToSentinelOne - Fetches TacitRed findings and creates IOCs in SentinelOne

Key Features:

  • Automated IOC synchronization
  • Domain and URL IOC creation from compromised credentials
  • Enriched IOC descriptions
  • SentinelOne API authentication
